basic_information.scholarship_name: The Prosser Sumner Endowed Behavioral Health Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: Prosser Sumner Endowed Behavioral Health Scholarsh
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies at UCO. Eligibility Requirements Be on track with the Board Certified Behavioral Analyst Certification course sequence at UCO at the time of distribution. Be a current or previous member of the UCO Black Student Association Be enrolled a minimum of 3 credit hours to be eligible Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall or spring semester to receive award All funds from this scholarship will be distributed during student teaching Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
